column5: With the US declaring that cloned animals are safe to eat does that mean we can now expect the birth of PETCA, People Eating Tasty Cloned Animals ???  My last snide remark for 2006 and all the best to everyone for 2007  Bob
i believe there is a spot on gods green earth for all the animals  ,RIGHT NEXT TO MY dang MASHED POTATOES.....LOL..LOL  P3TA. stands for       PEOPLE EATING TASTY ANIMALS
